t=int(raw_input())
di={}
for i in range(t):
    di={}
    n=int(raw_input())
    for i in range(n):
        count=0
        arr=raw_input().split(" ")
        di.update({arr[0]:arr[1]})
    for i in di:
        #print i
        #print j
        if(di[i]== '+'):
            count+=1
        else:
            count-=1
    print count
